reviewText:
Despite Oscar Nienmeyer' s radical ideology , this documental is an ambitious journey around his huge legacy , plenty of creativity and sensuality. The use of curves in most of his works. The sensual harmony and risky use concrete makes of this brief documental, the opinions of friends (Chico Buarque) and people who was close to him (Jean Paul Sartre) a real must-see.

Don't miss it!
